resources.string: Development: Java, C#, Bash, Node.js, Javascript, MongoDB, SQL, CSS, HTML
Troubleshooting: Java, C#, Bash, Node.js, MongoDB, SQL, HTML, CSS, XML, JSON, Jacascript, Web services
Desktop: Windows 10/11, Ubuntu Linux, Mac OSX
Software: Git, Team City, Bamboo, Android Studio, MySQL, Visual Studio 2010, IntelliJ, Mediawiki, MS Office, Firefox, Chrome

" I’m looking for another exciting engineering opportunity. I tend to gravitate to companies that are really innovating with their technology and keeping pace with what’s new in the world. I don’t find one particular problem space more interesting than others, there is so much to learn on any information technology project it’s almost always interesting. That’s one of the things I love about programming. 

 For businesses located in the greater Seattle area I am available to work in office, hybrid, or remote. My preference is for a hybrid or remote arrangement, and I have a proven track record of being highly successful working in that way. 

 My desired base pay is something in the range of $150,000 / year along with standard benefits. 

 My hours are flexible, but left to my own devices I tend to work later in the day. I am a night owl so if necessary I can work late into the night. 
"

" I’m looking for another exciting engineering opportunity. I tend to gravitate to companies that are really innovating with their technology and keeping pace with what’s new in the world. I don’t find one particular problem space more interesting than others, there is so much to learn on any information technology project it’s almost always interesting. That’s one of the things I love about programming. 

 I am unfortunately not able to relocate, so for businesses located outside the greater Seattle area I am only available for remote work. That said I have been a highly successful remote employee for 11 years, and I have no problem making meaningful contributions in a remote setting. 

 My desired base pay is something in the range of $150,000 / year along with standard benefits. 

 My hours are flexible, but left to my own devices I tend to work later in the day. I am a night owl so if necessary I can work late into the night. 
"
